  • 6. X-UNIVERSE


    • MARVEL CINEMATIC UNIVERSE (MCU) IS AN AMERICAN MEDIA FRANCHISE AND SHARED UNIVERSE CENTERED ON A SERIES OF SUPERHERO FILMS, INDEPENDENTLY

    PRODUCED BY MARVEL STUDIOS AND BASED ON CHARACTERS THAT APPEAR IN AMERICAN COMIC BOOKS PUBLISHED BY MARVEL COMICS. THE FRANCHISE ALSO

    INCLUDES COMIC BOOKS, SHORT FILMS, TELEVISION SERIES, AND DIGITAL SERIES. THE SHARED UNIVERSE, MUCH LIKE THE ORIGINAL MARVEL UNIVERSE IN COMIC

    BOOKS, WAS ESTABLISHED BY CROSSING OVER COMMON PLOT ELEMENTS, SETTINGS, CAST, AND CHARACTERS.....
